00057 XML::Iterator XML::Document::addChild(const XML::Iterator& inPos, const string& inValue, NodeType inType)
00058 {
00059     return attachChild(inPos, new Node(inValue, inType));

00074 XML::Iterator XML::Document::addRoot(const string& inValue, XML::NodeType inType)
00075 {
00076     // allocate new node
00077     Node* lNode = new Node(inValue, inType);
00078     // insert at end of root list
00079     insertAsLastChild(lNode);
00080     return lNode;
00081 }

00095 XML::Iterator XML::Document::addSibling(const XML::Iterator& inPos, const string& inValue, XML::NodeType inType)
00096 {
00097     PACC_AssertM(inPos, "Invalid iterator!");
00098     return attachSibling(inPos, new Node(inValue, inType));

00108 XML::Iterator XML::Document::attachChild(const XML::Iterator& inPos, XML::Node* inChild)
00109 {
00110     PACC_AssertM(inPos, "Invalid iterator!");
00111     PACC_AssertM(inChild, "Cannot attach nul pointer!");
00112     inPos->insertAsLastChild(inChild);
00113     return inChild;
00114 }
00115 
00123 XML::Iterator XML::Document::attachSibling(const XML::Iterator& inPos, XML::Node* inSibling)
00124 {
00125     PACC_AssertM(inPos, "Invalid iterator!");
00126     PACC_AssertM(inSibling, "Cannot attach nul pointer!");
00127     inPos->insertAsPreviousSibling(inSibling);
00128     return inSibling;
00129 }

00136 XML::Node* XML::Document::detach(const XML::Iterator& inPos)
00137 {
00138     PACC_AssertM(inPos, "Invalid iterator!");
00139     return inPos->detachFromSiblingsAndParent();
00140 }

00169 void XML::Document::erase(XML::Iterator inPos)
00170 {
00171     // detach and delete
00172     delete inPos->detachFromSiblingsAndParent();
00173 }

00177 void XML::Document::eraseRoots(void) 
00178 {
00179     // delete all childs of the root node
00180     eraseChildren();
00181 }
00182 
00186 XML::Iterator XML::Document::getFirstDataTag(void) 
00187 {
00188     for(Iterator lTag = getFirstChild(); lTag; ++lTag) if(lTag->getType() == eData) return lTag;
00189     return 0;
00190 }
00191 
00195 XML::ConstIterator XML::Document::getFirstDataTag(void) const
00196 {
00197     for(ConstIterator lTag = getFirstChild(); lTag; ++lTag) if(lTag->getType() == eData) return lTag;
00198     return 0;
00199 }

00204 XML::Iterator XML::Document::getFirstRoot(void) 
00205 {
00206     return getFirstChild();

00212 XML::ConstIterator XML::Document::getFirstRoot(void) const
00213 {
00214     return getFirstChild();

00219 void XML::Document::parse(const string& inFileName)
00220 {
00221     // open file
00222     ifstream lStream(inFileName.c_str());
00223     if(!lStream.good()) throw runtime_error(string("Document::parse() unable to open file ")+inFileName);
00224     // parse file content
00225     parse(lStream, inFileName);
00226 }
00227 
00230 void XML::Document::parse(istream& inStream, const string& inName)
00231 {
00232     Tokenizer lTokenizer(inStream);
00233     lTokenizer.setStreamName(inName);
00234     eraseRoots();
00235     Node* lNode = 0;
00236     // parse all elements
00237     while((lNode=Node::parse(lTokenizer, mNoParseTags)) != NULL) insertAsLastChild(lNode);
00238     if(lTokenizer.peekNextChar() != -1) {
00239         // stream contains bad markup
00240         lTokenizer.setDelimiters("", "\n\r");
00241         Node lBad(string("</")+lTokenizer.getNextToken(), XML::eRoot);
00242         lBad.throwError(lTokenizer, "invalid markup");
00243     }
00244 }
00245 
00249 void XML::Document::serialize(ostream& outStream, int inWidth, bool inIndentAttributes) const
00250 {
00251     bool lIndent = (inWidth >= 0);
00252     Streamer lStream(outStream, (lIndent ? (unsigned int)inWidth : 0));
00253     lStream.setAttributeIndentation(inIndentAttributes);
00254     // retrieve first root
00255     ConstIterator lRoot = getFirstRoot();
00256     if(lRoot)
00257     {
00258         // check for xml header
00259         if(lRoot->getType() != eDecl) lStream.insertHeader();
00260         // serialize all roots
00261         while(lRoot) (lRoot++)->serialize(lStream, lIndent);
00262     }
00263 }

00270 void XML::Document::setNoParse(const string& inTag)
00271 {
00272     mNoParseTags.insert(inTag);
00273 }
00274 
00277 void XML::Document::unsetNoParse(const string& inTag)
00278 {
00279     mNoParseTags.erase(inTag);
00280 }

00284 ostream& PACC::operator<<(ostream &outStream, const XML::Document& inDocument)
00285 {
00286     inDocument.serialize(outStream);
00287     return outStream;
00288 }

00292 istream& PACC::operator>>(istream &inStream, XML::Document& outDocument)
00293 {
00294     outDocument.parse(inStream);
00295     return inStream;
